txt.en: You have been tasked with defending Trestlebridge from an assault by the enemies of the Free Peoples.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Radhril for your reward!

'I have an urgent request, [placeholder].

'A large band of foes of the Free Peoples has been spotted heading towards the town of Trestlebridge. Their numbers are numerous and they have been seen slowly surrounding the town from all sides.

'If Trestlebridge is to stand, we must do all that we can to protect the town from this attack.'
A band of foes approaches the town of Trestlebridge! The town must not fall to the invaders!\n\nYour mission is to defend Trestlebridge from an assault by the enemies of the Free Peoples.
Some monsters in this mission will apply a flaming reflect shield to themselves.
Your mission is to defend Trestlebridge from an assault by the enemies of the Free Peoples.\n\nSpeak to Radhril.
'We have done well, [placeholder]. With the raiding party defeated, Trestlebridge is once again safe. The Free Peoples of Trestlebridge will certainly thank us for our efforts.'
